                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="15754" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="15754" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.13</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="4072">4,072</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="611"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Luna Rossa</b> by <b>Prada</b> is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. <b>Luna Rossa</b> was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniela Andrier. Top notes are Lavender and Bitter Orange; middle notes are Mint and Clary Sage; base notes are Ambrette (Musk Mallow) and Ambroxan. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Prada introduces a new masculine fragrance in Sept 2012, named after the sailboat and the sailing team "Red Moon" or Luna Rossa, which participates in the American Cup competitions. The new fragrance, considering its name, draws its inspiration from the world of extreme sailing, prestige, marine nature and passion for innovation and victory.</p>

<p></p>

<p>The composition is developed around the main note of lavender by perfumer Daniela Andrier of Givaudan. Intensity and freshness of accords are emphasized by the use of classical notes in new, innovative ways. Those notes include lavender absolute and bitter orange in the top, clary sage and spearmint in the heart, and ambrette absolute and ambroxan molecule in the base.
</p>

<p>
Bottle design is inspired by modern sailboats, signed by Yves Behar. The fragrance is available as 50, 100 and 150 ml Eau de Toilette.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                     Poor materials and cheap plastic in bottle design
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">10</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">66</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Initial citrusy freshness turns into a generic scent
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">13</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">74</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Sweaty and sour nuance may be off-putting
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="15754"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96720444101136; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.79.jpg" style="width: 3.75rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bitter-Orange-79.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bitter Orange</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.160.jpg" style="width: 4.05rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mint-160.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mint</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.79939954962467; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.164.jpg" style="width: 2.775rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Clary-Sage-164.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Clary Sage</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.76557320030326; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.107.jpg" style="width: 2.625rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambrette-Musk-Mallow--107.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambrette (Musk Mallow)</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.563.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambroxan-563.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambroxan</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="15754"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='8c4831af3d1c9862d544f770bc3727b0860' slotpayload='{"ct":"TBmBRYhtyqXEciivG41T92KqACjA6CV4OM0aTbT4baOJJWXa4lZuRR7bb3loK6hhL7GPZPTzwMBIdNtbVdV8GDCs8ECsBWuFONTS38jwUYyBdS3X7sCD+0SGHUtoM5HNppm+hV9T\/XFwgkrrh4K+1RgtKu2edmFuE9HI5lOVe8i16gaPPL9HmIVJ6MgoxFhz0tig7FgX3u5gc4mByCkJqXuVrod0JV5R00L5UUsdGcbz9vSagDHqSCdh+g1T34nncI1zXmCXgpquLtlDa1GTzCIX9lJgRFzGy1SVmGTrBOA=","iv":"5cb7db3d82787978c1f5bb598621c495","s":"cb3ae0aa86099570"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2355153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355153" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jam0045"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2329203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jam0045" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2329203">jam0045</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732106888" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love love this cologne, it's been my go-to for about 10 years! It's really nice and fresh up front, the dry down and first few hours are still nice and crisp but the smell on my clothes the next day is sooo cosy, it's perfect. I tried the Luna Rossa Carbon thinking I would like it as much but ended up selling it as I just wasn't a fan. Can't beat the original!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2355153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2355153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348126" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HungryHungarianHun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597939"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HungryHungarianHun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1597939">HungryHungarianHun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 18:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a smoother classier more luxurious version of Victorinox Swiss Army Classic. The lavender and base notes are stronger here compared to the mint in the Swiss Army Classic. If you own SAC I'd consider upgrading to this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2348126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2348126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To me, it seems feminine, or at most, unisex. Fresh, clean. A little soapy. I smell the mint on the test strip but not on my skin. If you want to smell good but not stand out, this is a pretty safe blind buy.<br />
<br />
Edit: after wearing this for about 2 hours, I'm really starting to dislike it. It's becoming nauseating</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2331670"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2331670#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203415">deuceaye24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 05:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing mind blowing, but this is well blended, inoffensive and versatile. Perfect office scent and blind buy safe.<br />
It has this cooling, fresh aromatic effect that lifts my mood whenever I get a whiff of it during a work day. I get about 6-7 hours longevity on my skin and sits close to the skin after the first hour. <br />
As a Prada fragrance, it is also classy. Honestly, this could be someone's one bottle Spring and Summer signature that just works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2323608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2323608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312024" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr lavenderlover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271335"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2271335.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr lavenderlover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Intense-Cedrat-Boise-72796.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72796.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Cedrat Boise"title="Intense Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312024ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312024" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2271335">Mr lavenderlover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens clean and fresh with very authentic peeled orange and mint.<br />
Smooth comforting lavender in the drydown.<br />
Excellent choise for spring/summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2312024"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2312024#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304562" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J Noel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1423409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="J Noel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15754.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa"title="Luna Rossa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1423409">J Noel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Purchased a travel size to check it out.<br />
<br />
Yesterday, I thought it was Ok.  Clean, very light, fine by mid day.   I felt like it was decent but thought that I definitely would never buy a full bottle.<br />
<br />
Second wearing today.  I applied in freshly showered skin and my body temp was up a little after working out.   The opening has this weird sour smell.  <br />
<br />
As it is settling, its starting to smell a bit more like it did yesterday.<br />
<br />
Ill probably wear this on occasion. But its definitely not full bottle worthy for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2304562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2304562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221674">RokinRandy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 20:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its Prada, Theyre not bad.  Little pricy for what you get imho.   Could be worse.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2304115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2304115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302784" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302784" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="delancy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595665.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="delancy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302784ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302784" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595665">delancy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 14:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Solid opening, lavender with a minty freshness. Clean and perfect for the office.<br />
<br />
Uninspired dry down, that same general, musky ambroxan-led "cologne guy" aura that inflicts so many modern day male designer fragrances and that you will have no doubt smelled countless times before by now if you are into fragrances...<br />
<br />
This is definitely not a "bad" fragrance by any stretch. However, it feels uninspired and uninteresting, even for a fragrance purposely designed to be a "clean guy" daily driver office fragrance. NPC vibes. <br />
<br />
This is blind buy safe. I honestly don't know how anyone could actually truly "hate" this. The problem is that there are just so many more alternative (and better) office-appropriate male fragrances out there that are a lot more interesting and will at least get your blood pumping a bit more than this. <br />
<br />
6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2302784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2302784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells a bit dated and old, mediocre but unique.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2289008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2289008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2287143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bingo30"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1851398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bingo30" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2287143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2287143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1851398">Bingo30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mint, lemon, lavender, and bergamot. Clean citrus aromatic; it smells pleasantly Italian barbershop. But perhaps a bit too plain and not quite evocative enough to be a fully realized love letter to a citrus fougere.<br />
<br />
There are just so many creations within this genre that do it better  and many are at better prices, too. So it becomes hard to recommend.<br />
<br />
6.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2287143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2287143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285077" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="A Stinky Potter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311439"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="A Stinky Potter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311439">A Stinky Potter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Citrus, mint, lavender opening with an unlisted hint of tobacco.  Recalls to mind other masculine dry citrus florals from 20ish years ago, like the dreamer, dolce and gabanna, realities for men.  Could have been released as a sport version of The Dreamer by Versace.  Pretty nice, honestly, but a little dull at this stage in the game.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2285077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2285077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2279385" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragranooga"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1316248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1316248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragranooga" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ormaie/Toi-Toi-Toi-52509.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52509.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Toi Toi Toi"title="Toi Toi Toi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2279385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2279385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1316248">Fragranooga</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-11">09/11/24 12:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is like 95% similar to The Dreamer on me. Secondhand bottle with the metal slats, only a smidge remaining in it. I would assume it's an older one. It smells great but yeah - very close to just being the same scent as Versace Dreamer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2279385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2279385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moyashi04"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1974296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moyashi04" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296">Moyashi04</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am not strongly loving this fragrance but I am not saying that this is bad, it is actually quite nice. The second I sprayed this on, I smelled both lavender and mint. It is heavy on those two. <br />
It does remind me of detergents. Not in a bad way, in any shape or form. This is a detergent I would like to smell as. <br />
It is basic, easy to wear, inoffensive and likeable. There is not much depth, so do not expect anything crazy from this. But it is still a good fragrance to consider buying/testing.<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2258521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2258521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324234">ReenaVic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 09:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this for my son but I wish I wouldve gave it to my husband. This cologne is so good. So very attractive. Extremely clean and soapy. I dont particularly like lavender heavy fragrances but the lavender in this concoction is very well blended and not heady. My goodness I love this over the 30 other designer and niche colognes in my home worn by both my husband and son. Its a masterpiece in my opinion and if you like soapy fragrances, is safe for even a blind buy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2256226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2256226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252639" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samanph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samanph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252639ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252639" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135419">samanph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 16:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very good choice if youre looking for something calm, beautiful, soapy, clean, and different from other designer fragrances. The combination of lavender, mint, and amber is excellent, which gives it a fougere and creamy vibe. It isnt loud, which makes it a great office fragrance in my opinion, or you could just use it every day when you want to smell good. Even though its an EDT, the longevity seems to be good on my skin. I applied two sprays on the same spot and was able to get over 6 hours out of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2252639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2252639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244093" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very nice soapy , minty ,fresh scent ,Love it .<br />

Its my signature scent ,most of the time i wore this ,somethimes even when i go to sleep i spray a bit on my wrist to have a good dream <br />

I just purchased a nee batch (with new bottle the skinny one) <br />

Performance: 7/10<br />
Price: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2220467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2220467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220089" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220089ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220089" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 07:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely has the Luna Rossa DNA, I believe this is the first release that influenced the line if i'm not mistaken. It's not a bad scent, but it doesn't have a wow factor. I believe it is too lavender heavy that brings this scent down. I also think it's overpriced on the market right now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2220089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2220089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215396" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wasijla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100690"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2100690.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wasijla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215396ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215396" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100690">Wasijla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 11:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just get my hands on this one which I craving for a long time. I am a sucker for lavender and it smells nice. Fresh and clean, not that soapy. I wish it could more soapy. Definitely recommended. But the longevity falls terribly on me. Maybe 30~45 mins, less than 1 hr. I also own carbon. Carbon is a longevity beast comparing to OG.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2215396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2215396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211280" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211280" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragriminator"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632910"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1632910.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragriminator" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211280ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211280" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1632910">Fragriminator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 16:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Easy-going. Breezy and mellow "round" herbs. Spa hand soap base, but not too soapy. Simple, but different enough from other fragrances. Relaxed and calm. Cooling and refreshing too. Slightly minty cucumber water. Obvious spring and summer daytime, but really, can work whenever. Crisp and clean don't necessarily have a season imo. Seems like this is part of the backbone LR Carbon is built on. This smells to me like a stripped-down version of that (i.e. no rich barbershop lather). I like this very much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2211280"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2211280#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A white crips shirt on a sunny summer day by the marina somewhere in French Riviera. Thats the smell.<br />
Lavender and mint dancing on a bed of clean musks.<br />
Fresh, light, airy, easygoing, white, crisp.<br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2205456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2205456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2200252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/143132">pachoulihead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 21:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one surprised me with how much I ended up liking it. I'm always assuming flankers are or should be better , especially if the original is 10+ yrs old but OG Luna Rossa has proved me wrong. This is the minty fresh clean lavender Summer scent I never knew I needed. It's so easy going and breezy I find myself reaching for it alot just to start my day. <br />
<br />
The mint has this cooling effect on me that is perfect for the Humid summer days were I live. As of now I am enjoying it better than Carbon and would place it in the top 3 of the line. Quality stuff</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2193725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2193725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1424775">uhohstinky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imo it doesnt change much from the initial blast to the dry down. Its definitely lavender/minty fresh but linear and not really suited for men in their 40s. This fragrance should be worn by younger guys imo. I do like it and it holds up well in high heat/humid weather. Longevity and Sillage fall into the moderate plus side of things but my teenage sons enjoy it way more than l do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2193185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2193185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192103" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192103" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="genec123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1721082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="genec123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192103ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192103" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); He described this perfectly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2192103"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2192103#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2188789" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2188789" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ACM_333"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087024"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087024.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ACM_333" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-607.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.607.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport"title="Allure Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2188789ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2188789" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087024">ACM_333</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 00:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada luna Rossa<br />
Very fresh clean soapy fragrance that is heavily underrated, often ignored as the other flankers shine, the Eau de toilette is a very versatile fresh scent with main notes of sweet but bitter orange, fresh clean mint, a aromatic herbal boost by the clary sage, smooth lavender, and a slight ambroxan finish with a calm musky Ambrette, this fragrance has a very alluring sillage trail and attracts compliments.<br />
Longevity 7.30-8hrs<br />
Projection 5/10<br />
Scent 8.5/10<br />
Season: all seasons</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2188789"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2188789#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178008" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlessedBlossom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2100140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlessedBlossom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Wulong-Cha-30567.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30567.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wulng Ch"title="Wulng Ch"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178008ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178008" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100140">BlessedBlossom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 13:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a stunning scent! <br />
<br />
Wasnt really expecting much- my husband was gifted this as a birthday present. But this simple bottle hides the most likeable, beautiful, lavender, fresh, minty juice! <br />
<br />
Such a safe blind buy freshie! Office safe, all year round. There isnt a single note in here that I could complain about.<br />
<br />
The lavender is prominent, but very refined and beautifully blended with the other ingredients. <br />
<br />
I dont get any amboxan from this, however it does dry down to a very calm &amp; cosy lavendery musk.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2178008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2178008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; In my opinion it continues being the best in the line Luna Rossa. It's a no brainer, you can just leave it next to the door and spray it before leaving for any casual occasion during the warm season.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163339" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brucie_K"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2141081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brucie_K" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); I had the chance to test all of them for days on my skin and this is the one I like the most! It's a really nice fragrance to use at the office or whenever you don't want to be in the center of attention with your obnoxiously strong scent. It's definitely a more warm weather fragrance with the fresh minty and lavender notes. Out of the Luna Rossa line I'd say this and the Ocean EDT is the safest to blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2163339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2163339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
