Best Prada</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2152604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2152604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ben&amp;Jerry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ben&amp;Jerry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/MYSLF-Eau-de-Parfum-84094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"title="MYSLF Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074821">Ben&amp;Jerry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 14:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada Luna Rossa is something different from the citrus heavy perfumes usually dominating in male summer scents. This perfume is indeed heavy on lavender and mint, almost to the point where I fail to detect any other accords. That being said, Lavender and mint is what Prada does in this fragrance, and boy do they get it right this time! <br />
Its a summer scent with a unique bend. I kinda love it! That being said I still have a few couple of minor complaints about this fragrance. One relates to longevity and sillage. Both could be described as both modest and weak performing, but then again I have to admit Im normally going light with the sprays. Still I would like for it to stay alive for longer than 3-4 hours before turning into a skin scent. Nostril fatigue may play a part in this, but thats how I experience it anyways. <br />
<br />
To me this is blind buy worthy as I can hardly imagine anyone disliking this perfume. Its fresh and clean lavender/ mint in a soapy way. It just works great! <br />
<br />
Scent profile: Lavender/ Mint<br />
Longevity: 4-6 hours <br />
Sillage: moderate <br />
Gender: Definitely male/ hard to pull off for women<br />
Value for money: Good <br />
Versatility: Allrounder in spring and summertime<br />
<br />
Verdict: 8/10 <br />
Blind buy: Safe</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2147718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2147718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140893" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="judahjudaaas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2109279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="judahjudaaas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2109279">judahjudaaas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 04:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A fresh, soapy fragrance. Even through the dry down it smells pretty much the same. Projection is pretty good actually. Something you can wear as a daily. Longevity is very good. Not everyone likes the soapy smell though, but me personally I don't mind it but I may have a bias opinion considering I also own two of its flankers. Not a bad smell, suitable for any age i'd say, youth to older men however more fitting for younger adults.<br />
This fragrance gives off a man with white t-shirt, jeans, clean white shoes and a gold chain kind of vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2140893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2140893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2116865" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="websterdaniel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/859802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.859802.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="websterdaniel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cerruti/Image-332.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.332.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Image"title="Image"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2116865ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2116865" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/859802">websterdaniel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-07">04/07/24 00:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alright so here it is!<br />
<br />
This fragrance is so comforting. I'm amazed I waited on this one. <br />
<br />
Longevity is 12+ hours. Sillage is moderate for first two hours, then sits close to skin for the remainder. This is incredible quality for the price. <br />
<br />
The first top notes to me are the exceptional lavender and bitter orange which becomes nuanced by the mint. The ambroxan definitely gives it the longevity and pushes the musk and clary sage. <br />
<br />
This is excellent. Anything friendly, but definitely for formal or moderate formal wear. This is NOT for lounging. No. This is more respectable. To wear this as a lounge fragrance, is like wearing Amouage to bed. <br />
<br />
Buy it. Get two bottles is possible. This is comforting. Excellent job Prada. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2116865"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2116865#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114651" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shaggy123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592176"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shaggy123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592176">Shaggy123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, bright musk. Very straightforward. The opening is bright and fresh with a bit of citrus. It'll dry down to a soft white musk. The musk has a little sweetness to it, and the texture is like silk, almost. <br />
<br />
I had a mildly positive impression of this at first sniff, but it grew on me. Very easily a daily driver/signature scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2114651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2114651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112311" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bizzy1995"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bizzy1995" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112311ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112311" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702">Bizzy1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 17:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Minty orange with fresh spicy sage and lavander, With a woodiness and sweetness to it. Nothing too special</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2112311"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2112311#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107107" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="3ak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="3ak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107107ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107107" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740934">3ak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 12:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This what I love about Prada and why I place them toward the upper end of designers. The motto "the cleaner the man the sexier" embodies Prada and Italian style perfumery. Ofcourse people will view this as basic but it's supposed to be. What I respect most about Prada is how they have mastered the soapy clean fragrances and don't tend to change lanes. Even when they do a warmer sweeter scent it's still wrapped in cleaness. This one is a perfect example. It kind of reminds me of Prada amber with some citruses and mint. I love the lavender citrus combo. Into the mid you pick up the mint. Dry down its just a little musky and clean. I do feel the citrus persists a bit giving it a slightly watery touch. It's impossible to offend someone with this. This is still a great option from the Luna Rossa line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2107107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2107107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106392" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2106392" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeremy son"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1998889"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeremy son" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2106392ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2106392" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1998889">Jeremy son</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 19:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's alright, the fragrance is missing something in my opinion it smells unfinished. It's a bit heavy on the lavender. Very clean smelling. Would make a good gift since it's very mass appealing or good for a first fragrance to start off your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2106392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2106392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2103655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hulknas187"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782673"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1782673.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hulknas187" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Vetiver-69.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vetiver"title="Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2103655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2103655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1782673">Hulknas187</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-25">03/25/24 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance in my opinion.  I have owned three different from this line.  Out of Carbon, Ocean EDP and this.  I will say this is my favorite, second Carbon.  It is clean, fresh, light fabric sheet smell to it.  Nothing fancy but well put together.  I am looking forward to rocking this more this Spring and Summer.  I feel you can get away with wearing this in the early months of Fall, September into late October.  Excellent work fragrance.  Projection is decent about two feet for about a hour and change.  Settles down to just above a skin scent...like three to four inches off the skin.  I put this on before work at 5:50am today 3/25/24 and it is now 11:54am and I can smell it going strong still.  I can easily say this is a 6 to 8hr fragrance maybe longer.  Six sprays is all I put on this morning.  <br />
<br />
Ranking Score vs the Others in the line<br />
8.75/10<br />
In General<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2103655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2103655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094979" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jmac88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462065"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1462065.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jmac88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentlemen-Only-Absolute-38932.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38932.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentlemen Only Absolute"title="Gentlemen Only Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462065">Jmac88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 23:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had a sample of this for years now and never smelled it til recently. I think it came with something I got from Macys. The opening reminds me of a rue 21 perfume I got in the mid 2000s. Quite nice and long lasting. I think its worth adding to the collection for casual wear. <br />
<br />
Update: after giving this some extensive testing, I really enjoy it and will be adding it to my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2094979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2094979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091999" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2075844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="n&iacute;simaldar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1548982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="n&iacute;simaldar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Allsaints/Incense-City-61465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Incense City"title="Incense City"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2075844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2075844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1548982">n&iacute;simaldar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-27">02/27/24 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kinda torn. Opens 5/5beautiful sweet mint and fresh lavender. Then 30min later it dries into a 3/5 musky ambroxan, which is safe and uninteresting. Very very clean and mild despite significant longevity. I guess there a just others in this genre Id prefer more, including Pradas own Amber Pour Homme or Lhomme for a clean soapy smell with a more interesting dry down. <br />
<br />
On a different note, I keep going nose blind. I think its gone then I can smell it again an hour later. I think its all the heavy aroma chemicals in the base. Thats frustrating as the wearer bc you cant enjoy your own fragrance. (I have this worth some other aroma chemical forward ones like Dior Homme 2020 or Elysium; why spend $$ on a fragrance I cant smell?).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2075844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2075844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062581" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I use this luna rossa all seasons .so i dont have any problems with longevity great stuff! great price!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2062581"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2062581#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062456" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ayman Abdelhameed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697054"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1697054.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ayman Abdelhameed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697054">Ayman Abdelhameed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 17:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great as a signature scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2062456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2062456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038922" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Psalzarulo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Psalzarulo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203">Psalzarulo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 16:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've owned this scent for quite some time now but somehow never got around to reviewing it. This because my everyday work scent as soon as I smelled it. It's Prada's signature clean lavender scent, but with musky/citrus top/basenote combo and pure freshness from the mint. <br />
<br />
The lavender in this is just intoxicating. It's super clean, fresh, and just sweet enough to make each whiff feel special. The muskiness that stays on the skin after dry-down just brings this to the next level. <br />
<br />
As others have noted, this is the fresh and clean version of Chanel Allure HSEE, which I also own and love very much. While they both capture the musky/citrus combo, Chanel is much more deep and sweet than the Prada. They both make fantastic office scents. <br />
<br />
This is definitely a masculine scent, and I do find that the ultra-minimalist, clean-cut scent fits a certain type of man (I'd like to think myself) who's going for a simple, professional feel. This is like a barbershop scent meets tech worker.<br />
<br />
This is really one of the scents that has never disappointed me, and really opened up my eyes to how much I loved masculine lavender scents. <br />
<br />
You can pretty much were this to any occasion, although it does lend itself to lighter, brighter, more professional settings. I find that it has average sillage. It doesn't last forever but it easily lasts 2-3 hours with projection and when applied on moisturizer can last over 8-10 hours on the skin. <br />
<br />
I have only done this once before (Ombre Leather) but I'm giving this a 10/10. The only thing that could possibly improve it would be added longevity, but that could always end up making the actual scent worth, so I think it's perfect as it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2038922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2038922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032819" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="milan.alleman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1200196.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="milan.alleman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Elixir"title="Le Male Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200196">milan.alleman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 14:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great scent, love the lavender in this. But the longevity is not it. I couldn't even smell it anymore on my clothes after a short time. Pleasant nonetheless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2032819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2032819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2021263" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Karenhandmade.com"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1689511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Karenhandmade.com" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Theodoros-Kalotinis/Aegean-Salt-Citrus-61984.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61984.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aegean Salt & Citrus"title="Aegean Salt & Citrus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2021263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2021263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689511">Karenhandmade.com</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 09:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada Luna Rossa: A Peppery Lavender Pleaser<br />
<br />
<br />
I have a long history with Prada Luna Rossa. It was my signature scent for several years, even though I initially despised it and relegated it to my office desk. But something changed over time, and I began to appreciate its charm. Perhaps it was the constant stream of compliments that it elicited from others. It is a crowd pleaser, indeed, and not in a dull or generic way.<br />
<br />
The fragrance is dominated by a sharp and spicy lavender and pepper note, which is softened by some fresh and crisp florals. Underneath, there is a chemical and aromatic base that is characteristic of many Prada scents. I suspect they have a secret ingredient that gives them this distinctive edge. I also own Prada Infusion Iris Cedre, which shares some similarities with Luna Rossa, but is more sensual and refined. Luna Rossa is more playful and lively, but still elegant and modern.<br />
<br />
The performance of this fragrance is moderate, but not disappointing. It lasts for about six hours on my skin, and projects well for the first two hours. However, there is a catch: it contains ambroxan, which can make you lose your sense of smell quickly. So you might not enjoy it as much as others do. Prada is becoming more expensive these days, and I think they need to lower their prices to keep their customers happy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2021263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2021263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010574" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rioja1973"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rioja1973" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); Clean, fresh, herbal, sophisticated and minimalistic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2010574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2010574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2008409" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Texasperumefan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1152862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Texasperumefan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2008409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2008409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); Smells kind of sweet. Like the tiniest bit. This is great! Just so pleasant to smell. Longevity is good too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="2008409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=2008409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994510" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994510" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hotsteppa_goodsmella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1917755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hotsteppa_goodsmella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Guilty-Pour-Homme-11037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guilty Pour Homme"title="Guilty Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994510ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994510" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1917755">hotsteppa_goodsmella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 19:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I always check Fragrantica for reviews but have never had much to say. I created an account just to review this scent. Ive been a fan of luna rossa sport for years but hadnt smelled the og until earlier this year. Had I read the reviews before smelling this I probably wouldve never gone out of my way for it. Boy am I glad thats not the case. <br />
<br />
This has been my daily frag for over 7 months now as I just cant stop enjoying the clean, casual and easy-going vibes this fragrance gives. I bought up 4 bottles of it on deep discount when Ulta still carried it. Im usually a fan of spicer/warmer frags (ysl lhomme edp, spicebomb, etc) but this hits different in all the right ways. It has helped me lean into my ideal clean boy aura while still embracing my casual, fun side. Makes me feel like I am squeaky clean and sexy. Bummer its gotten harder to find.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1994510"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1994510#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
