<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1792143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1792143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1791979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283300">Daviako</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-22">03/22/23 18:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is how you do lavender. I absolutely love this fragrance, and was sad when it finally ran out. Spray it all over your clothes and it will last a lot longer than on skin. Very calming and creamy, yet citrusy enough to be perfect for any time of year, save for maybe the extreme cold or heat.<br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1790244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1790244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1772219" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Soapy and familiar, but definitely has character and personality. Can be worn pretty much everywhere, though maybe not in the winter, as its longevity is mediocre. Linear fragrance, but it suits this type of scent, I really enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1772219"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1772219#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1767052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Elegant, sophisticated, lovely.<br />
Less soapy than Pradas usual signature but it still has some kind of soapy accord.<br />
The combination of lavender, mint and citrus is simple but awesome. It's mouth watering, smooth &amp; sharp at once.<br />
A humble and understated winner</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1767052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1767052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1762307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I sprayed it 10 times and it's still VERY subtle. It faded within a couple hours so I sprayed 7 more times and still could hardly notice it. Very fresh and light citrus, and definitely gives you that "clean" vibe. I really like the scent, just wish it preformed better. Im gonna try some flankers, hopefully they will do better on my skin.<br />
<br />
Edit 2/17: I got to try Luna Rosa Black, Ocean, and Carbon. Carbon is the best out of all of them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1752565"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1752565#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't think about the situation or what I'm wearing, I just spray this on and get noticed.<br />
<br />
Smells likes a spa, very simple fresh clean smelling soap. The bitter orange opening is lovely and fresh and the longevity is really, really good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1748929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1748929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1737365" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1737365" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afrikano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afrikano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1737365ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1737365" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); Perfect for when you want to wear something easy or something fresh out the shower. I get mostly lavender and mint, but the clary Sage adds a nice spa feel to it that makes it relaxing. It performs great as well and I think thats thanks to the ambroxan, also got me compliments whenever I wore it. Definitely a bottle Ill keep having in my everyday rotation. 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1737365"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1737365#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1737040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1737040" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Humble13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352800"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1352800.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Humble13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1737040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1737040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352800">Humble13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-18">01/18/23 06:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very safe scent. I can definitely see this being a lot of people's signature all year round. <br />
It is light, soapy and it's sillage isn't something crazy. People can smell you if you're next to them or if you walk by them. Longevity is also decent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1737040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1737040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1729164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
I didnt initially notice that its perfume for men :D I love it on my skin. It can definitely be categorised as unisex</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1691035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1691035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1687946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1687946" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MarkoPeeko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1359937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MarkoPeeko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Memoir-Man-10145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Memoir Man"title="Memoir Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1687946ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1687946" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359937">MarkoPeeko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-14">11/14/22 01:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautifully crafted. So clean and uplifting. <br />
<br />
A magical blend of orange, mint, lavender and musk. <br />
<br />
Longevity is around 5-6 hours on my skin. Projection is moderate. Around arms length. A few compliments wearing this today. <br />
<br />
Can see some resemblance with Infusion DHomme. Especially that clean, bright freshness that lingers. <br />
<br />
For the $100 (for $150ml), this is gonna get worn a lot this summer. <br />
<br />
Genuinely, I dont think Ive smelled a bad Prada frag. Awesome again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1687946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1687946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1687754" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So damn good the lavender and orange combo is done to perfection. Will get you so many compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1687754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1687754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1681361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1681361" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Invasionbg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265999"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265999.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Invasionbg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1681361ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1681361" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265999">Invasionbg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-05">11/05/22 02:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The simplicity and the lightness of this fragrance is super charming. It is quite transparent, reminding me of something that MFK may create. <br />
<br />
Very pleasant aroma, super elegant but there is I dont care kind of vibe as well. I am who I am. It reminds me of D&amp;G Pour Homme if the dna was up to date. Same heavy use of DIHYDROMYRCENOL but in a much softer way. <br />
<br />
Dont know if that performs, but just trying off the paper strip I am enjoying it big time. <br />
<br />
It is aromatic, woody, clean and soft smell.<br />
<br />
What I smell the most is musk, lavender, ambroxan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1681361"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1681361#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1662426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It has a slight resemblance to nautica voyage which slightly ruined it for me, considering I spent 5x more for the prada</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1662426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1662426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1662006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1662006" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PWAAAA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PWAAAA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1662006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1662006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452195">PWAAAA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-08">10/08/22 18:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lavender-orange bomb. honestly, maybe a bit too orangey for me, but overall great, and the lavender is done beautifully.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1662006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1662006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1657436" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Let_it_be"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581505"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1581505.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Let_it_be" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1657436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1657436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1581505">Let_it_be</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-02">10/02/22 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You would've thought this is a marine or blue fragrance since it's named after a yacht. Thank god it's something different and quite good actually.<br />
<br />
The Spearmint note makes all the difference, giving the scent a minty freshness that contrast with the light sweetness of the base. This is basically Spearmint + Lavender and light sugary base. The sweetness is just the right amount, most other fragrances these days are just too sweet. It smells simple but is actually quite stylish in a minimalist way. In comparison L'Ocitane is more old fashion. Both are good just different personality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1657436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1657436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; For those who shy away because of the performance duas darkside of the moon is east sme smell but beastly longevity.  Was shocked at how exact they are</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1651904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1651904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1650712" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1650712" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="H&uuml;mpel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="H&uuml;mpel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loewe/Loewe-7-Cobalt-66229.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66229.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Loewe 7 Cobalt"title="Loewe 7 Cobalt"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1650712ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1650712" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330000">H&uuml;mpel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-22">09/22/22 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's not a mint fragrance. Not a citrus fragrance. It is an inoffensive, slightly metallic lavender and ambroxan fragrance. Modern feel, crispy, freshly shaven cleanness. Perfect for the office. Performance is nothing special. <br />
<br />
I have L'Occitan EdT, which is a more realistic, natural lavender, therefore Luna Rossa is redundant to me. I also have Dior Sauvage, which is denser, has more body. So, it's business as usual - pleasant modernity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1650712"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1650712#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1647851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1210106">SamM1971</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-18">09/18/22 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's amazing how 10 years later the OG smells better than any of it's flankers. Clean, soapy, slightly metallic, subtle but yet present - this scent is easily the best office/day fragrance I have. Not a big wow but a bit unique and very luxurious smelling. Not a statement fragrance, more like easy breezy  daily beater. Longevity is a little bellow average (5-6 hours), so I re-spray  after lunch. Everyone loves it, not a single negative comment, love the bottle, the sprayer could be a little better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1647851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1647851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1643519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1643519" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DBlack47"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DBlack47" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-2021-71326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport 2021"title="Dior Homme Sport 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1643519ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1643519" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641">DBlack47</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-12">09/12/22 11:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favourite lavender scents. Starts out super fresh, soapy and lavender that dries down to  clary sage and ambroxan. I enjoy this scent for business meetings and workshops, or when its warm and Im on a mission (to get things done). <br />
<br />
Its a safe blind-buy, longevity is amazing, projects well and sillage is average. I love the Luna Rossa line for spring time, as well as summer (moderate heat &lt;36 degs Celsius) <br />
Rating: 4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1643519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1643519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1643456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Honestly a beautiful smell all throughout, it just doesnt perform.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1643456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1643456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is signature scent worthy for me and if you like soapy fragrances, you will love this one. The projection is very good, however the longevity on skin isn't the best for me. It lasts much longer if you spray on clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1640564"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1640564#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1624762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1204142">Scotty123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-15">08/15/22 07:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nice clean soapy scent. A good fragrance if youre just looking for something to wear everyday for whatever reason. I get decent longevity on clothes it can last over 8hrs like that, but still only has very light projection. Its nothing spectacular, but a really nice scent. If it was stronger it would be better. However if you just want to smell fresh and clean this is the scent for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1624080"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1624080#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1623979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1621303" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jpere963"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290035.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="jpere963" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1621303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1621303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290035">jpere963</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-11">08/11/22 01:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells great. Nothing mind blowing as its just a typical aromatic lavender based freshie. But this one definitely stood out from other freshies for me.<br />
<br />
This smells very familiar but I just cant seem to figure out what smell it is. My instincts are telling me its an AXE scent Im comparing it too. But which one?? I use to collect so many axe bottles when I was a 11-14 year old kid. I guess you can say that was my introduction to fragrance collecting.<br />
<br />
If my memory is correct, this could be reminding me of axe kilo? Based on fragranticas notes for that scent has lavender and vanilla so I think thats why this scent is so nostalgic for me. Definitely a successful blind buy </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1621303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1621303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1617532" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1617532" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaciekLondonWwa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaciekLondonWwa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1617532ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1617532" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533027">MaciekLondonWwa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-05">08/05/22 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one<br />
<br />
Phenomenal mix of lavender and minty notes<br />
It is a symbol of true elegance for me like freshly ironed white shirt<br />
So crisp fresh and masculine.<br />
I love to smell wiffs of it in the air<br />
I just wish it lasted a bit longer. I don't know what is the trick as some people say it is long lasting.<br />
Either my nose goes blind quickly or it simpy doesn't. <br />
Mine is a 150ml bottle batch code 2021 production year.<br />
One of my all time favourites but at the same time I am always so sad it doesn't last<br />
Go heavy on the trigger, be amazed and delighted whilst you can still smell it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1617532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1617532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1616114" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vat1cano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414481"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414481.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vat1cano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1616114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1616114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414481">Vat1cano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-03">08/03/22 08:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance. The sprayer sucks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1616114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1616114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1613431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1613431" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="holdaer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1332710"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="holdaer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-734.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.734.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme"title="L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1613431ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1613431" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1332710">holdaer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-30">07/30/22 06:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a safe daytime / office scent.  To me, this cologne reminds me of Bath &amp; Body Works lavender sleep lotion.  Not in a bad way, just in a safe clean relaxing way.<br />
<br />
With that said, I'll move on from this one and keep looking for a more unique daytime / office cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1613431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1613431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1611469" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517451">Barista1989</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-26">07/26/22 20:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The best. I said it. By best, I mean the best in the Luna Rossa line. Fresh and clean for any time of the year. Subtle but still gets the job done. One of my favorite fragrances to wear after a shower and shave. One of my favorite lavender notes. I do wish there was a bit more punch to the mint but I'm not complaining by any means. Bottom line, it's been good enough to continually go back to and wear consistently for 10 years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1611276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1611276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1608129" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1608129" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jond11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539437"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jond11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15754.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa"title="Luna Rossa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1608129ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1608129" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539437">jond11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-22">07/22/22 01:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada Luna Rossa is my first designer fragrance and it has introduced me into the world of fragrances. I find it to be fresh, friendly, and non-offensive. It's versatile and I've been very pleased with it's performance. As far as longetivity and projection, you can easily pick up the scent it from six feet away and it lasts around six hours. I have never been complimented on a fragrance until I tried this on. I would recommend Luna Rossa if you want a signature scent. Something you could throw on every day without a thought whether you're going to work, the gym, or just running errands.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1608129"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1608129#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1598632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1429579">JayBeez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-07">07/07/22 15:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I reach for this one when I want a subtle, yet noticeable clean and soapy vibe for a few hours. After that, it's mostly a memory, which is OK since I don't always want to have my fragrances linger forever. On me, this is quite similar to Paco Rabanne PH which lasts far longer if I'm looking for more longevity.<br />
<br />
Great any time of year, but on me it really shines in warmer weather. Will be a permanent part of my collection for years to come.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1598632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1598632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1597478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1597478" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dogmeat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/104296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.104296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dogmeat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Radiant-Mirage-69707.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69707.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Radiant Mirage"title="Radiant Mirage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1597478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1597478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/104296">dogmeat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-05">07/05/22 22:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have always loved Luna Rossa and I still do. I own this one, Black, and Ocean. I think those two flankers along with Carbon get all the love (I have never tried Eau/Sport). However, I think the original is much more unique than Ocean or Carbon. It is more versatile than Ocean, Carbon, or Black (I do love Black though). I have been re-visiting this one in the summer heat and I am falling in love with it all over again. In typical Prada fashion, this is clean and fresh with a luxe quality about it...still soapy and powdery (maybe a little less so, than L'homme or Amber Pour Homme). This is a rich, soft lavender musk that always smells right for the occasion...even if the occasion is just sitting at home, smelling nice. I love this stuff.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1597478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1597478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1596455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1594017" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jarno1208"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1269327.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jarno1208" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Tonka-Cola-76893.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76893.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka Cola"title="Tonka Cola"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1594017ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1594017" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269327">jarno1208</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-30">06/30/22 01:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it. Aromatic scent. Masculine. Clean and Fresh. Great for office. Safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1594017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1594017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1591595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1591595" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marxwick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marxwick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Ambre-Narguile-2669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"title="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1591595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1591595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083">Marxwick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-26">06/26/22 04:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a clean, soapy, and aromatic fragrance, portraying a masculine scent.<br />
If you take out the soapiness and bitterness, then it is similar to Dsquared2 Wood for Him.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1591595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1591595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1590768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1590768" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sea2sky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214767"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1214767.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sea2sky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1590768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1590768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214767">sea2sky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-24">06/24/22 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just finished a 100ml bottle. Turned out to be the most used fragrance in my collection. It is fresh and green without being too citrus forward. It is casual enough but also elegant too which makes it quite versatile. And yes - very mood uplifting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1590768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1590768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1588302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1588302" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellBound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1207427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellBound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Malbrum-Parfums/Tigre-du-Bengale-30559.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30559.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tigre du Bengale"title="Tigre du Bengale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1588302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1588302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207427">SmellBound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-20">06/20/22 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first bought this in 2013, shortly after it came out. It was a nice, clean fragrance that served as an olfactory "swiss army knife". I could wear it anywhere at all with no concerns whatsoever. I finished the bottle and moved on to other dramatic, popular scents of the day. I though I had forgotten about it altogether. <br />
<br />
And out of the blue a few months ago I came across a bottle on ebay. I wondered if I would still like it as much as I did back then, and decided to buy it. I wasn't disappointed at all.. Not a bit. The stuff is just as wonderful as it was before. (even more so because of the simplicity of it) <br />
<br />
Something about the clary sage, ambrette, mint and slight citrus just makes magic on my skin. A clean, fresh, very slight sweetness that lasts for a solid 7-10 hours on my skin with 6-8 sprays.  Where this one truly shines is in the high summer heat. I'm talking 95F and up. It never gets cloying, or "too soapy/fresh". It does come and go after the first few hours, but it's always there. <br />
<br />
This one really is a hidden gem that most people pass right on buy and never consider. But, it fits the bill for any situation I can imagine. Office, casual, night..  It doesn't scream.. It doesn't even really shout. But it gets noticed, complimented on, and remembered. And that is exactly what I'm looking for a lot of the time despite all of the other scents I've picked up over the years. It just "fits" so many different social shapes, its almost impossible not to love. <br />
<br />
I'm very glad I decided to pick this one up again. Worth every penny.<br />
<br />
Edit: This is becoming a summer favorite this year. a number of wears in temps at 100 and above. Great results.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1588302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1588302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1587647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is such a lightly sweet minty clean unisex perfume, that's the only way I can describe it for now. I almost want to buy it to wear it myself... so tempting! But perhaps I'll just let this scent remind me of him lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1587647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1587647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1587063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/74979">sebseb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-18">06/18/22 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very beautiful clean scent, very smooth, very soapy barbershoppy, that leans unisex. This smells refined, but there is nothing strong in it, something to make you go "wow" or turn you away, so it kinda lacks some character. This would smell like a very good cheapie, but it's a Prada and it's not cheap. I do like it very much, but for that kind of money I would better get Guerlain Homme EDP and still have half of my money left and the Guerlain does the exact same thing, only a little less sweet and more masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I'm so in love with the scent. The opening of that minty bitter orange lavender is so mesmerizing and cleverly done. Already past the 6.5hours mark and I can still smell the perfume. I bet if I tell someone that this perfume cost me few hundred dollars they will sure believe it. <br />
The only regrets I have is to only discover this fragrance 10 years later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1583987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1583987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583173" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
