This is and has always been a clean, soapy good quality great scent and bottle overall. And surprisingly still has good performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1583173"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1583173#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1582965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1582965" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aczwy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344925"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1344925.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="aczwy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1582965ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1582965" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1344925">aczwy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-12">06/12/22 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>everyday i-want-to-smell-nice-but-i'm-not-doing-anything-special scent; so nice for running errands but not using precious sprays of niche fragrances. the lavender and mint really shine to give this a bright freshness, but it's neatly balanced out by the ambrette and ambroxan to give it some depth. minimal projection, it stays pretty close to the skin although there's still a reasonable scent bubble. leans a touch masculine on me, but i would still say it's fairly unisex</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1582965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1582965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1582249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1577596" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Waldo Jeffers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1514603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1514603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Waldo Jeffers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1577596ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1577596" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1514603">Waldo Jeffers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-04">06/04/22 07:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Versatile, fresh warm weather fragrance. Very well composed, quality is evident but individual notes are hard to identify. There is nothing jarring about Luna Rossa. Fine for office or basically anywhere. Can easily be worn year round but best in summer for me. Good longevity lasts all day. A great example of a safe scent with mass appeal that is not boring. When I just want to smell good in the summer without really having to think about it, this is what I reach for</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1577596"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1577596#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1571125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144812">Bfish88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-25">05/25/22 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a newer style tester bottle and wasn't impressed at first but this has grown on me because it opens up a bit. I thought it would be a skin scent quick by the soft opening but in the very linear drydown, it gets some heft to it...not much at all but enough to be a moderately decent upscale fragrance. This has office appropriate all over it, duh it's Prada.<br />
<br />
Quite possibly the best warm weather dumb reach fragrance for a more classy scent profile.  I really like this and even in its current formulation. Nice!<br />
<br />
This will get a spot on the rotation shelf for sure!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1571125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1571125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1566925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1303295">Jayjay2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-19">05/19/22 06:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was looking for a nice mint fragrance and once I smelled this I knew Id found the one.<br />
<br />
This is a really nice scent that everyone will enjoy. Its fresh yet soft and can be worn in every situation and any weather. <br />
<br />
The mint is nice and strong in the opening and the lavender is present as well. Its a lightly powdery freshie that I enjoy.<br />
<br />
If youre looking for a dumb reach or signature fragrance, this is a great choice</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1566925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1566925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1566700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1566700" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ikea pencil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ikea pencil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1566700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1566700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327427">ikea pencil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-18">05/18/22 19:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Everyday freshy runner.<br />
<br />
Fresh, gentle, soapy, versatile and unisex. The mint, lavender and sage are mixed incredibly well, the bitter orange gives this a small bite, The amberette giving a brighter side here and the ambroxan gives a hint of masc (but I still consider this unisex). This is so easy to enjoy and very easy to put on! I can see this be something someone throws in the morning without thinking about just for the sake of smelling nice without making a statement. Also, this is infinitely better than Carbon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1566700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1566700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1566551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1566551" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spartaksci"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1260013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spartaksci" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1566551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1566551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1260013">spartaksci</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-18">05/18/22 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very clean and soft green scent. While i do find it pleasant and refreshing, i don't think it comes close to other Prada frags in terms of originality and presence, like L'homme and Amber Intense. But it does have the signature soapyness from Prada and it's very well-rounded with no sharp notes that could potentially put people off. Casual summer days or even as an office scent, since this is very fresh and clean.<br />
Also, there's a slight bitterness here that very faintly reminds me of Versace The Dreamer, which i absolutely love, but much more toned down and subdued. All in all, Luna Rossa is a decent pick-up.<br />
<br />
UPDATE: Turned this from a like to a love. After a couple of wearings, this one has grown on me. There's something about the simplicity of this scent that got me as i wore this throughout the days, it doesn't "try" to be classy and elegant. It just is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1566551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1566551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1561968" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561968" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Burtajones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1431877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Burtajones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Michael-Malul-London/Ocean-Noir-70722.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70722.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ocean Noir"title="Ocean Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561968ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561968" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1431877">Burtajones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-11">05/11/22 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great white tee shirt spring/summer run to the grocery store fragrance. No complaints here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1561968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1561968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1557287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1557287" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lockwood_douglas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1090882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lockwood_douglas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1557287ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1557287" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090882">lockwood_douglas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 19:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been wanting this for a long time, and finally pulled the trigger.  This is an inoffensive, dumb reach fragrance.  Nothing mind-blowing, but just smells damn good.  I was always afraid it probably had weak performance, but here on Fragrantica, it seems most ppl have judged it moderate or better.  This, to me, smells better than all of the [more popular] flankers.  My 2nd favorite is Luna Rossa Eau Sport in the white bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1557287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1557287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1555485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1555485" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vola_cea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1193037.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vola_cea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1555485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1555485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193037">vola_cea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-02">05/02/22 12:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not need to leave a review, because it feels like preaching to the choir. People buying this 10 years after release already know how excellent Prada is. As expected, this is another incredibly smooth and interesting fragrance that is entirely inoffensive and safe. Blind buy worthy if you like Prada's line.<br />
<br />
I was afraid this would be more herbal and flat based on the notes, but to me this is a clean soapy take on Versace Pour Homme / Acqua Di Gio style fragrances. I am not an expert nose, but they all have the same intoxicating aromatic accord. Luna Rossa simply supports this accord better and does away with overly scratchy citrus and water notes.<br />
<br />
Definitely a crowd pleaser and compliment getter. This will be replacing VPH for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1555485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1555485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1553749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1547484" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vat1cano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414481"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414481.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vat1cano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1547484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1547484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414481">Vat1cano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-20">04/20/22 18:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I previously gave this fragrance a bad review calling it a smell of dryer sheets.<br />
I have to say that I had a change heart. I happen to get my hands on a small bottle of this and tried it on for a week and I find myself liking this fragrance.<br />
It's far more interesting than bleu de chanel<br />
Citrus and powdery, it also has a herbal aroma to it. It smells natural and not synethic like most fragrance and not over the top. I will be buying the jumbo bottle soon!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1547484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1547484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1542738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1542738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bpmck78"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328721"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bpmck78" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1542738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1542738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328721">bpmck78</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-13">04/13/22 14:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm convinced that folks are here at the Luna Rossa page writing  reviews for LR Carbon and LR Sport.<br />
Luna Rossa does NOT smell like Sauvage. Luna Rossa Carbon does.<br />
I would not consider Luna Rossa a lavender bomb. Luna Rossa Sport  is the lavender bomb.<br />
Regardless, all 3 are good and the entire Prada lineup is solid.<br />
Luna Rossa is soapy, clean and fresh with moderate performance but good performance for a freshie. It isn't loud or brash. It is what it is and does it on purpose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1542738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1542738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1535665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 5/10 - Meh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1534899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1534899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1533408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1533408" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dmd63"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/560310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.560310.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dmd63" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1533408ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1533408" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/560310">dmd63</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-30">03/30/22 09:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>good, but forgetable scent.<br />
<br />
very, very, very poor performance, both projection and sillage.<br />
<br />
nothing special, really</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1533408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1533408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1532546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1532546" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ViceCity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ViceCity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/First-Instinct-37753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="First Instinct"title="First Instinct"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1532546ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1532546" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478914">ViceCity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-28">03/28/22 23:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was surprised to observe how highly rated and praised this perfume was on many discussions, having more or less bought mine on an impulse 2 years ago. I personally rate it second best to Amber Pour Homme among the Prada fragrances I have owned.<br />
<br />
Having said that Luna Rossa remains an easy one to enjoy. To me it smells very sweet and flowery so I reckon the clary sage plays a big role. It makes you feel refreshed on those hot summer days and is not uncomfortable or headache-inducing. I find it holds up quite well: sometimes I will spray around midday and still find the smell lingering when taking my evening shower 7-8 hours later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1532546"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1532546#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1532540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1532540" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tinidril"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/399919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.399919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tinidril" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Pi-39.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pi"title="Pi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1532540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1532540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/399919">Tinidril</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-28">03/28/22 23:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yes I am a woman, and I wear this. I have always prefered mens scents...maybe its the musk and spice and lack of overwhelming floral. I have loved fendi, givenchy pi, mr.burberry...there's a trend..<br />
<br />
I am not very good at picking out notes, but I can get images from the scents. <br />
<br />
This one makes me think of when you are going to an expensive christmas party. Or any special occasion in the evening, like a yacht or fancy wedding reception. <br />
It is quite strong at first, enough to make you wonder is you've made a mistake, but it levels down to a sharpness that is pleasant. It lasts quite awhile for me. <br />
I usually spritz it on a half hr before reconnecting with my husband as he dislikes strong smells.<br />
I am happy I bought it and it should last some time as I don't wear it every day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1532540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1532540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527436" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Satanael"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Satanael" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471458">Satanael</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-21">03/21/22 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another classy from Prada.<br />
They are master of soapy, clean fragrances but in soft musky way rather then detergent wise.<br />
To bad we have only option for day and night.<br />
For me it works best just late afternoon during summer holiday.<br />
Just spray it and grab some nice cocktail on the beach.<br />
also good office scent but would rather L'homme for that purpose.<br />
If you can get it with discount, don't hesitate.<br />
Very clean and inoffensive and not much citrusy either. It says bitter orange but I am getting neroli vibe of it and dry down is just smooth musky amber.<br />
I wish my pillow and duvet smell like that every day.<br />
So calming, relaxing and cosy.<br />
Performance is quite good. On my skin about 5-7 hours but on clothes way longer.<br />
Silage is not strong is off course rather small which in this case is big plus, as you want to smell like that for close encounters.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
- For me, this fragrance smells really : !light! powdery, soft, clean &amp; soapy. <br />
I wouldn't say this smells Fresh. <br />
<br />
picked up a 50ml bottle at a discounter for 30,- EU.<br />
I feel like that's a great deal getting a nice, clean, inoffensive smelling fragrance like this. <br />
2 sprays last me about 5-6 hours on my skin. <br />
<br />
Smell : 7/10<br />
Performance : 7/10<br />
Price : 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1516578"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1516578#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1514380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1132025">Kevin The Llama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-28">02/28/22 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this and I'm glad I did. Very pleasant clean smelling fragrance. This would be perfect for an office or school setting because it's inoffensive and smells very nice and clean. And surprisingly I get pretty good performance from this fragrance. Overall this is a pleasant inoffensive everyday fragrance that can easily get the "you smell nice" compliments. I give Luna rossa a 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1513863"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1513863#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1507573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1507573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Srben"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/257584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.257584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Srben" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Amber-Pour-Homme-Intense-11240.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11240.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Amber Pour Homme Intense"title="Prada Amber Pour Homme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1507573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1507573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/257584">Srben</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-19">02/19/22 06:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prada doing what Prada does best: a beautiful, clean, powdery fragrance. Skin times obviously vary, but this stayed on my clothes for 12+ hours. I've had no trouble finding this anywhere that sells men's fragrances, so if the notes intrigue you, it doesn't have to be a blind buy. Very clean and fresh, highly recommended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1507573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1507573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487030" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HikingViking"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HikingViking" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416622">HikingViking</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-20">01/20/22 05:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a surprise. Got a testerstrip last week, and was immediately enamoured by the super fresh soapiness of it. Today is exactly a week later, and the strip is still radiating this lovely frag. A little acidity from citruses in the opening but rapidly followed by sage, lavender and general clean soapy mids. Blue fragrances can suck donkey schlongs - soapy is the new fresh. Payed $75 for a 100ml. A little close to Intenso (D&amp;G) in the opening and early mid, but the Prada is a enormously better performer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1487030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1487030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1484956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1484956" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Made by Kouros"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1395030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Made by Kouros" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1484956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1484956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030">Made by Kouros</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-17">01/17/22 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled this in the mall. 1st IMPRESSION: Unsurprising, okay but generic, left no memory.<br />
<br />
Months later I read the note breakdown and reviews: people call this tangy lavender soap. I like lavender, so this sounds like a great sports scent. Must try again!<br />
<br />
2nd 1st IMPRESSION: First ingredient is synthetic shower gel. The second ingredient is mint. Third ingredient is water and soap with which I washed this off. It is strong. It's not lavender, it's not classy. <br />
<br />
VERDICT: This is a good gift for your 19 year old nephew who likes to smell like a fresh perfume guy. I still only like Black from the Luna Rossa line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1484956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1484956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="15754" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
