                            <div id="parent1222801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222801" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caifan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/939475"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.939475.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caifan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Hommage-a-l-Homme-Eau-de-Toilette-13401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hommage  l'Homme Eau de Toilette"title="Hommage  l'Homme Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/939475">caifan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-10">09/10/20 20:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Luna Rossa is a fragrance that I like more every day, although I will confess that the first time I tried it, it did not attract attention.<br />
Although it is classified as aromatic citrus, for me it is almost an aromatic fougere. The first few minutes are citrusy and clean, with that style typical of Prada fragrances, but later it becomes more aromatic with lavender, mint and a soapy base.<br />
Luna Rossa is very versatile, perfect for almost any situation. This fragrance is underrated and in the shadow of L'Homme, which is also good, but not as good as Luna Rossa.<br />
Its development is rare, because sometimes it seems that you do not bring fragrance and suddenly it returns. Also, it works for me with very good longevity.<br />
<br />
This is one of my favorites fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1222801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1222801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent691117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc691117" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mdox407"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/318121"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.318121.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mdox407" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Cascade-6206.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6206.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cascade"title="Cascade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma691117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd691117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/318121">Mdox407</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-28">03/28/16 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Do you want compliments? Buy Luna Rossa.<br />
<br />
Do you want attention from the ladies? Buy Luna Rossa.<br />
<br />
Do you want a fragrance that lasts and lasts and lasts? Buy Luna Rossa.<br />
<br />
Scent Itself : 9.5/10<br />
Longevity : 9 hours<br />
Sillage : 4 feet away<br />
<br />
I have over 150 bottles in my collection and this is in my top 10. Buy Luna Rossa. It's amazing.<br />
<br />
Nough Said.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="691117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=691117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent431582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc431582" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chrissyc15"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/702627"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.702627.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chrissyc15" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-25324.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25324.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium"title="Black Opium"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma431582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd431582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/702627">chrissyc15</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-12-01">12/01/13 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this for my husband, and HE LOVES it because I CANNOT keep my hands off him! It is not a typical in your face man cologne. It begins slightly citrus, and then, it becomes more of a subtle mint and oceanic sent mixed with an outdoor woodsy undertone. It also has wonderful sillage and longevity. Definitely a lot better than my Prada Candy!<br />
<br />
I got a sample of this when I bought my Prada Candy. I am NOT a fan of most of the Prada smells because they are to musky or florally and tend to hurt my head. BUT I LOVE THIS!!!!!! I smelled it and instantly ran up to my husband and sprayed it on him to see how it reacted with his chemistry. AMAZING COMBINATION!!!!! <br />
<br />
I have seen some people describe this as a more unisex, and because of its softness I could kind of see why. However, I cannot see a "feminine" woman wearing this. Yes it is soft, but still VERY masculine. Not masculine as in "testosterone pumping, lets go beat the crap out of someone", but more "lets lay in bed and let me hold you in my arms where you are safe and forget the world." It gives a quiet comfort and confidence. Which lets face it men... Thats what most of us women want is to be able to feel safe. <br />
<br />
DID I MENTION I LOVE THIS!!!!????</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="431582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=431582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1038104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1038104" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bubbles1964"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1095199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1095199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bubbles1964" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Rebatchi/Joyeux-Osmanthe-51510.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51510.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Joyeux Osmanthe"title="Joyeux Osmanthe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1038104ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1038104" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1095199">Bubbles1964</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-05">03/05/19 15:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im a woman who gravitates toward masculine scents, and Pradas Luna Rossa is well done, maybe not a masterpiece but I like it. Opening features a fizzy lavender cocktail with citrus and sage. Its clean, modern and in my opinion, unabashedly unisex. <br />
<br />
Im a fan of the perfumer, Daniela Andrier, and count Anglique Noire for Guerlain, Une Amourette Roland Mouret for Etat Libre d'Orange, The Bleu for Bvlgari and Pradas Infusion Diris as some of my favorites perfumes. <br />
<br />
So what about Luna Rossa. Its easy to wear and I enjoy it. I only wish that ambroxan was turned down a notch, as it tends to dominate the drydown. Although not a love, it is a thumbs up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="1038104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=1038104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent943054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc943054" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Germany"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/137168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.137168.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Germany" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-Cologne-51692.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51692.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus Cologne"title="Aventus Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma943054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd943054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/137168">Germany</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-15">05/15/18 16:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My sons signature scent. He always smells amazing , clean and fresh out of the shower. Prada scents are so well done . Better than all those niche scents out there. I am so over them and always come back to the minimalist ,classy clean scents like this one. I bought my son so many over the last 7 years and this is his favouurte and most complimented fragrance. I have to agree. Soooooo good!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="943054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=943054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="15754" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent717012" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc717012" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FarsyAtTurab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/638232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FarsyAtTurab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Amber-Pour-Homme-Prada-Man-1044.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1044.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Amber Pour Homme (Prada Man)"title="Prada Amber Pour Homme (Prada Man)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma717012ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd717012" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/638232">FarsyAtTurab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-06-21">06/21/16 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mesmerizing, humble and peaceful scent, I love it. Its like an early morning walk in the woods with a soft mist comforting you, very refreshing. Sillage and longevity depends on your skin chemistry, mine last 8 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="717012"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=717012#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent440474" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc440474" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drakecito"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/289857"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.289857.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="drakecito" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma440474ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd440474" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/289857">drakecito</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-12-29">12/29/13 02:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sorry but this is my true opinion.<br />
Synthetic soap with nice bottle but made with poor materials (fragance and bottle). The edges are made with cheap plastic. Made in China maybe?<br />
The fragrance does not smell bad (better in the first minutes),but does not contribute anything to the world of perfumes. Flat and boring. Very generic and toooo sinthetyc ... It's like a Axe deodorant.<br />
<br />
Sillage is low and longevity moderate-low.<br />
<br />
scent: 5/10<br />
longevity: 5/10<br />
sillage: 4/10<br />
<br />
Prada, can you not do anything that don't smel like soap?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="440474"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=440474#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent851162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc851162" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stinger839"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074473"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1074473.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stinger839" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Marble-Cologne-71429.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71429.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Marble Cologne"title="Marble Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma851162ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd851162" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1074473">stinger839</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-14">08/14/17 14:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very strong soap open, probably because of the lavender. The sage sinks into the lavender, creating this super aroma that is much better than either of them alone. The orange and mint are just barely there, you have to sniff for them. It doesn't really evolve, just strong lavender soap for its duration.<br />
<br />
Smells softer on my skin than on t-shirt, where it smells more acrid and less complex.<br />
<br />
A straightforward and simple composition. If I were blind sniffing, I would say this is a women's scent or what it most smells like, a luxury soap. I strongly dislike soapy and lavender heavy scents, so I am glad I got this in a sample and not a blind buy of a larger quantity. <br />
<br />
Would probably do okay in warmer weather, especially spring. It's not musky, spicy, woodsy, or amber radiant enough for the winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="851162"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=851162#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent292509" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc292509" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arbre Amer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/172954"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.172954.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arbre Amer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Borneo-1834-5201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Borneo 1834"title="Borneo 1834"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma292509ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd292509" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/172954">Arbre Amer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-10-09">10/09/12 14:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find nothing special in this new Prada. After having read so many comments about the top quality ingredients and the signature of such a talented perfumer, this lavender wash, with no volume or character was a huge disappointment. After the first few minutes when the camphorous notes subside, a truly disturbing element appears. I don't know what it is but it smells sour and sweaty. The same nuance is evident in another Prada, Amber Extreme. I think it is a product of the clash between some aspects of resins and the modern aromachemicals. After that phase is gone all that's left is a generic sweetness contrasted by the screech of Iso E Super. No projection after that. Does not compare to infusion d'Iris or Amber.<br />
<br />
I think Prada is at its best, in fragrance and clothing, when doing elegant-strict with an urban edge and the occasional off scale elements. When veering into the sporty the whole style collapses. The bottle design (really bad in my opinion, with the aluminum part not quite fitting the glass) and its contents seem to be addressed to the fans of the "red stripe" line of clothes and accessories which is the cheapest (both in price and design quality) that Prada can do. Good for those who want to sport the PRADA logo, even if there is less of Prada essence in their buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="292509"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=292509#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent339574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc339574" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jun0711"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/400553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jun0711" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma339574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd339574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/400553">Jun0711</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-02-25">02/25/13 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This cologne is Soapy smell cologne same like every the other Prada cologne for men</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15754"comment_id="339574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-15754.html?ccid=339574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="15754" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.33934.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Eau-de-Toilette-33934.html#cc2355712"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Guerlain</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Shalimar Eau de Toilette</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="When I was young I remember trying this and Youth Dew, I hated both and couldnt fathom why anyone would wear them. Now Im older I ADORE these majestic older scents. This reminds me of Mitsouko, definitely family resemblance. Complex, sexy and confident, not for little girls.">by
            <em>JedburghPear</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69248.png"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.18486.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Franck-Olivier/Blue-Touch-18486.html#cc2355711"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Franck Olivier</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Blue Touch</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"

    </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <script>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
